statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) as patient_count FROM patient_data GROUP BY gender ORDER BY patient_count DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, admission_date FROM patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' AND prescription IS NOT NULL ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_id, patient_name, record_date, doctor_name, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC, record_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, gender FROM patients GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT diagnosis, admission_date FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT med_name, med_type, dosage FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure, oxygen_level FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC
SELECT temperature, timestamp FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature BETWEEN 98.0 AND 100.0 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name;
SELECT med_name, med_type, dosage FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > NOW() ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE oxygen_level < 95 AND temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY admission_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patients JOIN vital_signs ON patients.patient_id = vital_signs.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure LIKE '120/%' ORDER BY age ASC, diagnosis DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type, treatment_cost FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_diagnosis IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords INNER JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE record_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id), AVG(treatment_cost) FROM Treatments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 3 ORDER BY AVG(treatment_cost) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name FROM Treatments INNER JOIN Patients ON Treatments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;

SELECT p.patient_name, d.diagnosis_name, m.med_name FROM Patients p JOIN Diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE d.diagnosis_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, l.test_name FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN Lab_Results l ON p.patient_id = l.patient_id WHERE l.result_value > 100.00 ORDER BY l.result_value DESC;
